org.getspout.spoutapi.gui

Interface Label

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Widget
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Button, CheckBox, ComboBox, RadioButton, Slider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericButton, GenericCheckBox, GenericComboBox, GenericLabel, GenericRadioButton, GenericSlider

    public interface Label
extends Widget
    The GenericLabel class represents text on the users screen.

    Normally the text will overflow the widget "box" if it is smaller than the text itself, however you can force the minimum size of the widget to the size of the text content with the setAuto method, and use the setFixed method to stop it resizing if inside a Container.
